schema_json.category: array of strings, Product categories, examples: ['Men's Clothing']
schema_json.currency: string, Currency of the order, examples: 'EUR'
schema_json.customer_first_name: string, First name of the customer, examples: 'Eddie'
schema_json.customer_full_name: string, Full name of the customer, examples: 'Eddie Underwood'
schema_json.customer_gender: string, Gender of the customer, examples: 'MALE', 'FEMALE'
schema_json.customer_id: integer, ID of the customer, examples: 38
schema_json.customer_last_name: string, Last name of the customer, examples: 'Underwood'
schema_json.customer_phone: string, Phone number of the customer, examples: ''
schema_json.day_of_week: string, Day of the week the order was placed, examples: 'Monday'
schema_json.day_of_week_i: integer, Day of the week as an integer, examples: 0
schema_json.email: string, Email of the customer, examples: 'eddie@underwood-family.zzz'
schema_json.manufacturer: array of strings, Manufacturers of the products, examples: ['Elitelligence', 'Oceanavigations']
schema_json.order_date: date, Date and time of the order, examples: '2016-12-26T09:28:48+00:00'
schema_json.order_id: integer, ID of the order, examples: 584677

products.base_price: float, Base price of the product, examples: 11.99
products.quantity: integer, Quantity of the product ordered, examples: 1
products.manufacturer: string, Manufacturer of the product, examples: 'Elitelligence'
products.tax_amount: float, Tax amount for the product, examples: 0
products.product_id: integer, ID of the product, examples: 6283
products.category: string, Category of the product, examples: 'Men's Clothing'
products.unit_discount_amount: float, Discount amount per unit, examples: 0
products._id: string, Unique ID of the sold product, examples: 'sold_product_584677_6283'
products.created_on: date, Creation date and time, examples: '2016-12-26T09:28:48+00:00'
products.product_name: string, Name of the product, examples: 'Basic T-shirt - dark blue/white'
products.price: float, Price of the product, examples: 11.99

schema_json.sku: array of strings, Stock keeping units of the products, examples: ['ZO0549605496', 'ZO0299602996']
schema_json.taxful_total_price: float, Total price including tax, examples: 36.98
schema_json.taxless_total_price: float, Total price excluding tax, examples: 36.98
schema_json.total_quantity: integer, Total quantity of products, examples: 2
schema_json.user: string, User who placed the order, examples: 'eddie'

location.lon: float, Longitude of the location, examples: 31.3
location.lat: float, Latitude of the location, examples: 30.1

geoip.region_name: string, Name of the region, examples: 'Cairo Governorate'
geoip.continent_name: string, Name of the continent, examples: 'Africa'
geoip.city_name: string, Name of the city, examples: 'Cairo'
